title: Blog-Based Advanced Nutrition Course: Deepening Concepts Through Reflection and Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nutritional theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced nutrition course for adult learners over 40, enhancing real-world application skills through blog-based reflection and interaction in online real-time classes

learning_goals: Learners will reflectively document the process of applying nutrition concepts to real-life situations on a blog once a week and interact with peers and instructors at least three times.
Through blog discussions, learners will analyze peers' nutritional practice cases, correct their own errors, and drive conceptual change.
Based on blog feedback, learners will develop a personalized nutrition management plan and submit a report on its implementation results over 8 weeks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
